TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
"Hey show me how you hold your iPhone."

That's some low-hanging fruit though. Even "The iPhone is not perfect." would do.

The Harry Potter series would be better without all that magic nonsense.

True!

KSP .90 isn't coming out.

Anime is weird.

*Takes a Molotov to the face*
Bronies are subhuman animals.
Venus is a horrible place that we should never, ever visit. (I think the fan base for that one may be just one person. )
The 911 is just a jumped-up Beetle.
Who wants to watch a show about insane Japanese people and their pets?
Why did all the girls go to Beatles concerts when they can just get them on their Iphones?!
Geology isn't a real science!! *Gets hit with 1,000 paintballs*

Terminator 4 is much more spectacular than the first one.

The Terminator (1) is a boring theater drama movie.
Paleontology is just a gateway science for kids.
Paintball is for lamers who aren't adult enough to call themselves out when they're hit by an airsoft pellet.
How does all that stuff fit in the Tardis? So unrealistic!
Stephen King is a talentless hack, and his Gunslinger is a Clint Eastwood ripoff!
The new youtube layout is really good it's so logical and not stupid in any way

Justin B..No..bad idea.

Top Gun has too much Kold War and akward characters.
skyrim is a horrible game unlike Elder Scrolls online which is the best game ever
Metal Slug 4 was an excellent sequel to Metal Slug 3!
Final Fantasy X-2 was good. And I played it.
Is it cheating to use Mechjeb?
All ice expect to live in a wonderland where everithing flow smoothly. A way to Be leave it yup yup.
Consoles are better than pcs.
I see Dr. Who; but where is Dr. What and Dr. When?
The new actor for Dr Who looks nothing like the old one! What were they thinking casting him, even a blind man could see the difference.
I don't play kerbal space program, because it's nothing like nasa
